tool_description: Tests and validates mobile designs across different screen sizes, orientations, and device types to ensure responsive behavior and layout consistency.

device_categories.description: Device categories to test (small-phone, large-phone, small-tablet, large-tablet)

test_scenarios.description: Specific scenarios to test (text-scaling, dark-mode, one-handed-use)

error_messages: Invalid design specs: Provide valid design specification data
Invalid device categories: Use small-phone, large-phone, small-tablet, or large-tablet
Invalid orientations: Use portrait or landscape
Invalid test scenarios: Use text-scaling, dark-mode, or one-handed-use
usage: Provide design_specs and device_categories; optionally specify orientations and test_scenarios to generate comprehensive responsive layout test results.

compatibility_scores.description: Compatibility scores for each device category (0-100)
